assignMenu

@RequestMapping(value="/assignMenu")
@PermissionMapping(code="000002",
                   name="\u5206\u914d\u83dc\u5355")
@ResponseBody
public Map<String,Object> assignMenu(@RequestParam(value="ids")
                                                                                           Long[] ids,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="rid")
                                                                                           Long rid,
                                                                                           @RequestParam(value="checkStatus")
                                                                                           Boolean[] checkStatus,
                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
分配菜单给角色,将分配状态改变了的菜单id(即参数ids)传回,chechStatus记录每个菜单是否勾选(是否要分配). 这里传回的id全部是需要修改的,这里是由前台ztree控件保证的.

Parameters:
ids -
rid -
checkStatus -
request -
response -
Returns:
